message: Let's split it down the middle.  Fair is fair, right?
You had your chance, now it's my turn again
I'm willing to give you a little more, but we need to reach an agreement soon.  Time is money, and it's losing value for me with each round.
You're right, time is money, and I'm running out of patience
I'm upping my offer again. We're both losing money with every round.  Let's make a deal.
You're getting desperate, I can see that. But I'll only go so far
This is my final offer. We're both losing money here, and this is the best I can do.  Let's end this and get our share before it's too late.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll take a little more
I'm taking a huge risk here, but I'm going all-in.  This is my absolute final offer.  If you reject it, we both lose everything.
You went all-in, but I'm the one holding the cards. Last chance
